summary: Thinking this will prevent war, the US government gives an impenetrable supercomputer total control over launching nuclear missiles. But what the computer does with the power is unimaginable to its creators.
cast: Eric Braeden|Susan Clark|Gordon Pinsent|William Schallert|Leonid Rostoff|Georg Stanford Brown|Willard Sage|Alex Rodine|Martin E. Brooks|Marion Ross|Dolph Sweet|Byron Morrow|Lew Brown|Sid McCoy|Tom Basham|Robert Cornthwaite|James Hong|Serge Tschernisch|John Davey|Paul Frees|Fred Holliday|Robert Quarry|Don Ross|William Traylor
title: Colossus: el proyecto prohibido
